entries.name: new(place, event, tuple, expires=nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new NotifyTemplateEntry that watches place for +event+s that match tuple.

entries.name: each()
entries.desc: Yields event/tuple pairs until this NotifyTemplateEntry expires.

entries.name: notify(ev)
entries.desc: Called by TupleSpace to notify this NotifyTemplateEntry of a new event.

entries.name: pop()
entries.desc: Retrieves a notification.  Raises RequestExpiredError when this NotifyTemplateEntry expires.
